cab.content: SECRET.OPERATIONS.From: General Delme Radcliffe, Italy.To:CI.G.SFar Office.Despatched:5.24 p.m. 17.12.17.Received: 9.45 a.m. 18.12.17.10C52. December 17th. Situation this evening as follows 3rd Army, Nothing of importance to report.4th Army. 18th Corps. Enemy attacked about mid-day after heavy artillery preparation against front Col. dell Orso-Monte Solarolo-Monte Valdervia and Monte Medata. Attack which., was made by 200th German Division was entirely repulsed. Some prisoners were taken and a machine gun.First Army. Enemy batteries active against Italian lines from Kaberlaba to Val Bella. During day of 16th about 1 p.iru enemy initiated an attack in bottom of Brenta valley but was dispersed by artillery. Aerial activity considerable on 3rd Army front and on Asiago plateau intense.At various points enemy dropped bombs.
